name: Space Pirate Demo
description:
After an intense space battle, your ship got destroyed and fall onto the near by planet which are floating islands.

You mission is to rebuild the ship by collecting the Ship parts.

Features

- Low Poly Graphics

- Collect Coins

- Find Secret Treasure

- Shoot Enemies

- Collect Ship Parts

- Jump From Island To Island.

- Buy the Power Core from the Vending Machine?

- And Fix Your Ship .

Winner of Best Visual Design Award From GameSpace MM Gamejam!!

Music Credits:

Menu Music: Zapsplat - Chiller

In Game Music: The Buccaneer's Haul - Shane Ivers
